help: Errors counter for method getblockchaininfo.
name: bitcoin_getblockchaininfo_errors

help: Current network name as defined in BIP70 (main, test, regtest). Text value in labels.
name: bitcoin_chain

help: The current number of blocks processed in the server.
name: bitcoin_blocks

help: The current number of headers we have validated.
name: bitcoin_headers

help: The current difficulty.
name: bitcoin_difficulty

help: Median time for the current best block.
name: bitcoin_mediantime

help: Estimate of verification progress [0..1].
name: bitcoin_verificationprogress

help: Estimate of whether this node is in Initial Block Download mode.
name: bitcoin_initialblockdownload

help: The estimated size of the block and undo files on disk.
name: bitcoin_size_on_disk

help: If the blocks are subject to pruning.
name: bitcoin_pruned

help: Any network and blockchain warnings. Text value in labels.
name: bitcoin_warnings

help: Errors counter for method getmempoolinfo.
name: bitcoin_getmempoolinfo_errors

help: Current tx count.
name: bitcoin_mempoolsize

help: Sum of all virtual transaction sizes as defined in BIP 141. Differs from actual serialized size because witness data is discounted.
name: bitcoin_mempoolbytes

help: Total memory usage for the mempool.
name: bitcoin_mempoolusage

help: Maximum memory usage for the mempool.
name: bitcoin_maxmempool

help: Minimum fee rate in BTC/kB for tx to be accepted. Is the maximum of minrelaytxfee and minimum mempool fee.
name: bitcoin_mempoolminfee

help: Current minimum relay fee for transactions.
name: bitcoin_minrelaytxfee

help: Errors counter for method getnetworkinfo.
name: bitcoin_getnetworkinfo_errors

help: The server version.
name: bitcoin_version

help: The server subversion string. Text value in labels.
name: bitcoin_subversion

help: The protocol version.
name: bitcoin_protocolversion

help: True if transaction relay is requested from peers.
name: bitcoin_localrelay

help: Whether p2p networking is enabled.
name: bitcoin_networkactive

help: The number of connections.
name: bitcoin_connections

help: Minimum relay fee for transactions in BTC/kB.
name: bitcoin_relayfee

help: Errors counter for method getchaintxstats.
name: bitcoin_getchaintxstats_errors

help: The timestamp for the final block in the window in UNIX format.
name: bitcoin_time

help: The total number of transactions in the chain up to that point.
name: bitcoin_txcount

help: Size of the window in number of blocks.
name: bitcoin_window_block_count

help: The number of transactions in the window. Only returned if 'window_block_count' is > 0.
name: bitcoin_window_tx_count

help: The elapsed time in the window in seconds. Only returned if 'window_block_count' is > 0.
name: bitcoin_window_interval

help: The average rate of transactions per second in the window. Only returned if 'window_interval' is > 0.
name: bitcoin_txrate
